column4: Inbound Richmond Rd at N Eagle Creek Dr
column5: Vehicles in the intersection.  Inbound Richmond Rd is down to one lane.  N Eagle Creek is shutdown.

column3: I-75/I-71 at the Brent Spence Bridge:
column4: The bridge is closed until further notice due to fire damage from a previous collision.
